\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 18034}

\subsection*{In an Odd State}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Pill Bug}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 20 mg & oral & Methadone & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 140.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Well as far as Methadone goes it's fun.  Once I get past the shitty throwing up phase it'll rock my world and kick my ass.  If I take it in the morning it'll last me all damn day.  I take them in pill form, so it's time released. 



The thing w/ Methadone is that when I take them it's normally at night.  I still get a little sick to my stomach, and normally I throw up at one point or another, but once I do I feel great and it won't bother me again.  Anyhow, I usually take them at night and they kick my ass.  LOL\ldots   I'll be sitting there in a weird state of I'm here but I'm not here. It's fun.  



By the next day I get up and basically feel shitty the entire next day.  That kinda sucks.  I think that's just me though.. All of my friends eat them and they have no problem with that.

\end{document}
